product.longDescriptionHtml:
This LG Nitro HD P930 mobile phone features a brilliant 4.5" display with 1280 x 720 pixels to showcase movies and streaming media in stunning clarity. The 4G speed ensures fast downloads.

Requires a minimum data service starting at $20/month. Early termination fees will be prorated, starting at $325 minus $10 for each full month of service commitment completed.

features.feature: Stereo Bluetooth 3.0 compatibility For wireless communication with a Bluetooth-enabled device. HDMI, Wi-Fi Direct and DLNA technologies let you share with other compatible screens (MHL adapter required; not included).
4.5" high-definition touch screen with 1280 x 720 pixels For an impressive display and simple navigation.
4GB internal memory and 16GB microSD card Let you store phone numbers, photos and videos.
8.0MP digital camera Features 1080p recording and playback with autofocus and LED flash for taking still photos. A front-facing 1.3MP camera lets you easily video chat.
E-mail and messaging sync Includes POP3/IMAP/EAS compatibility for wide-ranging support.
Hands-free speakerphone Allows you to keep your hands on the wheel while driving.
MP3 ringtones Personalize the sound of your phone.
Up to 7 hours talk time and up to 10.8 days standby With included lithium battery.
Android 2.3.4 operating system Allows you to stay connected and productive on the go.
4G speed Offers quick and easy connection speeds.
Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n network For Internet capability on the go and mobile hotspot connectivity for up to 5 devices (additional fees may apply).

features.feature: From our expanded online assortment; not available in all Best Buy stores
Android 2.3 operating system Allows you to stay connected and productive on the go.
4G speed Offers quick and easy connection speeds.

Wi-Fi capability For Internet capability on the go (additional fees may apply). Check e-mail via Gmail, Exchange and personal e-mail support. AT&T Mobile Hotspot capability for additional connectivity options (requires appropriate data plan).
Bluetooth 2.1 compatibility For wireless communication with a Bluetooth-enabled device.
4" SVGA color touch-screen display For clear viewing of your text messages, photos and videos.
microSD card slot Allows you to store phone numbers, photos and videos.
5.0MP digital camera For capturing special moments. Records 720p video.
MP3 player Lets you listen to your favorite tunes on the go. Watch TV shows via AT&T Uverse Live TV.
AT&T Navigator Provides driving instructions to get you to your destination.
Multimedia messaging and text messaging Let you communicate by typing.
Customizable MP3 ringtones Allow you to personalize the sound of your phone.
1,000-entry phone book Keeps your contact numbers easily accessible.
Hands-free speakerphone Allows you to keep your hands on the wheel while driving.
Speed dial Lets you call frequently used numbers with the touch of a button.
Up to 6 hours talk time and up to 18 days standby With included lithium battery.
